title: Five-Star Malta Seaside Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea
description: Sensational nightlife and spectacular Mediterranean Sea views await with a five-star stay at InterContinental Malta, an IHG Hotel. Explore St. Julian’s historic streets, discover a brilliant collection of world-class bars, restaurants and nightclubs and splash in the balmy turquoise waters of St. George's Bay. Sip aperitifs on Paranga restaurant’s seaside, open-air deck, find inner balance at Carisma Spa or laze the afternoon away by Skybeach, the hotel’s mirage-like rooftop infinity pool.
offer_address: St. George's Bay St. Julian's, STJ 3310, Malta
